Package com.luismonserratt.moviemanager

package com.luismonserratt.moviemanager
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    DatabaseManager
    Provides a method to establish a connection to the MySQL database used by the Movie Manager application.
    Movie
    Represents a movie with details such as title, genre, release year, rating, duration, and whether it has been watched.
    MovieDAO
    Data Access Object (DAO) for performing CRUD operations on the movies table.
    MovieManagerGUI
    Graphical User Interface (GUI) for managing movies stored in a MySQL database.
    MySQLConnectionTest
    Simple class to test the connection to the MySQL database.
